summary: Completed testing of 'Launch Competition from Template' feature. All 12 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing confirmed all features work correctly: Launch button visible on all template cards, dialog opens with template preview, competition name pre-filled with month + template name, dates auto-calculated from template duration, season dropdown shows active/upcoming seasons, auto-start toggle works, rules from template section displays correctly, API endpoint creates competition successfully, template usage count increments, and competition appears in Competitions tab.
critical_code_review_comments: All 'Launch Competition from Template' features implemented correctly
Template usage count (times_used) increments after creating competition
Rules are copied from template to competition correctly
Season assignment works when season_id is provided
Competition appears in Competitions tab after creation
Launch dialog has all required data-testid attributes for testing
Date auto-calculation based on template duration works correctly
Competition name pre-filled with current month + template name
seed_data_creation: Test competitions with TEST_ prefix were created during testing. Backend tests include cleanup fixture.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Launch Competition from Template feature fully functional. All features tested: Launch button on template cards, dialog with template preview, pre-filled competition name (month + template name), auto-calculated dates from template duration, season dropdown, auto-start toggle, rules preview section, POST /api/incentives/competitions/from-template endpoint, template usage count increment, competition appears in Competitions tab. Frontend data-testid attributes: use-template-{template-id}, comp-name-input, comp-start-date, comp-end-date, comp-season-select, comp-auto-start, comp-create-button.

Launch button visible on all template ca.details: All 9 template cards have visible Launch button with data-testid='use-template-{template-id}'

Launch dialog opens with template previe.details: Dialog shows template icon, name, tagline, and rule badges (e.g., Threshold, Top N)

Competition name pre-filled with month +.details: Name auto-filled as 'February Weekend Blitz' for Weekend Blitz template in February

Start/End dates auto-calculated from tem.details: Weekend Blitz (3 days) shows dates 3 days apart, Daily Sprint (1 day) shows 1 day apart

Season dropdown shows active/upcoming se.details: Dropdown shows 'No season' option and filters to active/upcoming seasons only

Auto-start toggle works.details: Toggle present with data-testid='comp-auto-start', enabled by default

Rules from Template section displays cor.details: Shows rule type, description, and points (e.g., 'Threshold: 75 to qualify, 150 pts')

API endpoint POST /api/incentives/compet.details: Returns 200 with competition id and status. Creates competition with template_id set.

Template usage count increments after cr.details: Daily Sprint template times_used increased from 4 to 10 after multiple test creations

Competition appears in Competitions tab.details: TEST_UI_Daily_Sprint_Launch visible in Competitions tab with correct status and duration
